text: I don't think children's inner feelings have changed. They still want a mother and father in the very same house they want places to play.
author: Beverly Cleary

text: There are 80 million moms in the United States. Forty million stay at home with their children.
author: Andrew Shue

text: I get whatever placidity I have from my father. But my mother taught me how to take it on the chin.
author: Norma Shearer

text: It's a great mistake, I think, to put children off with falsehoods and nonsense, when their growing powers of observation and discrimination excite in them a desire to know about things.
author: Anne Sullivan

text: I regret not having had more time with my kids when they were growing up.
author: Tina Turner
